en.title: About Me
en.content: I am Pham Duc Kien, a Finance and Data Analytics professional. With a passion for technology and finance, I specialize in financial risk analysis, machine learning in finance, and building data analytics dashboards. I am currently studying at the Academy of Finance and have experience in developing financial applications using Python, React, and other modern technologies.
